------剔出税收合同
select YR,SUM(MONEY_ADD) MONEY_ADD from (
select convert(varchar(4),cus_pay.PAY_TIME,120) YR,cus_pay.MONEY_ADD
from MO_CON_PRO_INFO pro
join MO_CONTRACT_INFO con on pro.CONTRACT_ID = con.CONTRACT_ID
join V_SEARCH_SUB_PAY_NEW cus_pay on pro.CON_PRO_ID = cus_pay.CON_PRO_ID
join MO_CUSTOMER_INFO cus on con.C_ID = cus.C_ID
where  cus_pay.PAY_TYPE <> '4' and cus_pay.COM_NAME like   '%分公司'
and cus_pay.PAY_TIME >='2008-1-1' and cus_pay.PAY_TIME <'2015-6-1' ) temp
group by temp.YR
order by temp.YR
----------------------查询公司合同
select con.CONTRACT_ID,con.CONTRACT_CODE,company.COM_NAME,con.CREATE_TIME,SUM(liushui.MONEY_ADD) bb
 
from MO_CONTRACT_INFO con
join MO_CON_PRO_INFO pro on con.CONTRACT_ID = pro.CONTRACT_ID
join MO_CUS_PAY_INFO liushui on pro.CON_PRO_ID = liushui.CON_PRO_ID
join MO_CUSTOMER_INFO cus on con.C_ID = cus.C_ID
join [DB02.MAINONE.COM].PublicDB.dbo.MO_COMPANY_INFO company on cus.COM_ID = company.COM_ID
where liushui.PAY_TIME >='2015-1-1' and liushui.PAY_TIME <'2015-5-31'
and con.CONTRACT_STATUS_NEW = '0' and con.SHUISHOU_STATUS = '0'
and company.COM_NAME like '长沙分公司'
and liushui.PAY_TYPE <>'4'
group by con.CONTRACT_ID,con.CONTRACT_CODE,company.COM_NAME,con.CREATE_TIME
order by bb desc


select SHUISHOU_STATUS from MO_CONTRACT_INFO
where CONTRACT_CODE 
in ('zdts0215040076')
zdcs011503033
update MO_CONTRACT_INFO set SHUISHOU_STATUS = 0
where CONTRACT_CODE 
in ('zdcs011503033')


select SUM(bb) from (
select con.CONTRACT_ID,con.CONTRACT_CODE,company.COM_NAME,con.CREATE_TIME,SUM(liushui.MONEY_ADD) bb
 
from MO_CONTRACT_INFO con
join MO_CON_PRO_INFO pro on con.CONTRACT_ID = pro.CONTRACT_ID
join MO_CUS_PAY_INFO liushui on pro.CON_PRO_ID = liushui.CON_PRO_ID
join MO_CUSTOMER_INFO cus on con.C_ID = cus.C_ID
join [DB02.MAINONE.COM].PublicDB.dbo.MO_COMPANY_INFO company on cus.COM_ID = company.COM_ID
where liushui.PAY_TIME >='2015-1-1' and liushui.PAY_TIME <'2015-6-1'
and con.CONTRACT_STATUS_NEW = '0' and con.SHUISHOU_STATUS = '1'
and liushui.PAY_TYPE <>'4'
group by con.CONTRACT_ID,con.CONTRACT_CODE,company.COM_NAME,con.CREATE_TIME) temp
